content: {"name": "Acts Community Development Corporation", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Pick up free bags of groceries that provide three meals a day for three days for three people\n", "email": "", "url": "www.actsnyc.com", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2114 Mermaid Avenue", "address_2": "", "city": "Coney Island", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11224", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.5760038, "longitude": -73.98840799999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 415-1170", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "23:00", "closes_at": "00:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "23:00", "closes_at": "00:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "23:00", "closes_at": "00:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open on holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Offers after school program"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
